entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
